actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: Uses Dreadful Glare and makes one rotting fist attack.

actions.name: Rotting Fist
actions.description: DC 16 CON save or cursed with mummy rot (no healing; max HP -10 (3d6) per day; dies and turns to dust at 0 max HP; remove curse ends).

actions.name: Dreadful Glare
actions.description: Creature within 60 ft. makes DC 16 WIS save or frightened until end of mummy's next turn; fail by 5+ also paralyzed. Success grants 24-hour immunity to mummy and mummy lord glare.

legendaryActions.name: Attack
legendaryActions.description: Makes a rotting fist attack or uses Dreadful Glare.

legendaryActions.name: Blinding Dust
legendaryActions.description: Each creature within 5 ft. makes DC 16 CON save or is blinded until end of its next turn.

legendaryActions.name: Blasphemous Word (Costs 2 Actions)
legendaryActions.description: Non-undead within 10 ft. that can hear make DC 16 CON save or are stunned until end of mummy lord's next turn.

legendaryActions.name: Channel Negative Energy (Costs 2 Actions)
legendaryActions.description: Creatures within 60 ft. can't regain HP until end of mummy lord's next turn.

legendaryActions.name: Whirlwind of Sand (Costs 2 Actions)
legendaryActions.description: Transforms into a whirlwind, moves up to 60 ft., then reverts; immune to all damage and can't be grappled/petrified/prone/restrained/stunned while in whirlwind.
